title.narrative: Training programme on development policy and cooperation

description.narrative: Training on development policy and development cooperation consists of face-to-face learning online studying and other learning opportunities such as peer learning Development Policy Days and related workshops.Education is targeted at people in charge of d evelopment cooperation related issues in ministries and embassies including the local staff. Another target-group is the personnel recruited for international development cooperation assignments from outside the Ministry for Foreign Affairs. There are also courses that are open for organisational or consulting representatives of ICI or other development cooperation organisations.Effectiveness and efficiency of development policy and cooperation require that personnel receive adequate training to strengthen and maintain the skills needed in each task which our training offers. In addition the aim of our training is to increase the efficiency and meaningfulness of the work by enhancing the understanding of the entities and strengthening the personnel?s own res ources and abilities. The funding being applied for (EUR 60 000) is intended for organising the Development Policy Days training the trainers and increasing the web-based training in 2018.
